description: Defines a Flutter screen widget called MatchesScreen that displays a grid of profile matches, with a header titled 'Matches' and a button to navigate to a filter screen.

classes.name: MatchesScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that renders the matches grid and navigation controls.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the MatchesScreen, including app bar, grid of profiles, and filter button.
